page.title: 01GAZETTEER
page.content: { Lutterworth is a small market town in South Leics., close to the M1 and M6. Surrounded by rich farmland and small villages. {Local towns/cities: Rugby,Leicester,Coventry,Northampton. {Population:}1981_6673, 1985 _8OOO. {Education: }2 Primary,1 High School, 1 Grammar School and Community College. {Places of worship.}C.ofE. R./C. Meth. Cong./Un.Ref. Pent. Jeh.Wit. {Health /Services:}Health Centre, Cottage Hospital, Dentist, Optician. Ambulance, Fire station,Police. {Amenities:}5 Garages, 3 Hotels, P.O., Library, Swimming pool. {Market:}Thurs. Early closing: Wed. {Villages:}Cotesbach _ Church,P.O. 3 Farms dwellings. Misterton _ Church, Misterton Hall Farms, dwellings.
